org.lwjgl.system.glfw

Interface ErrorCallback

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ErrorCallback.Str
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ErrorCallback.StrAdapter

    public interface ErrorCallback
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the SetErrorCallback method.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ErrorCallback.Str
      Extends ErrorCallback with an alternative version that accepts a string.
      static class  ErrorCallback.StrAdapter
      An ErrorCallback.Str adapter.
      static class  ErrorCallback.Util 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void invoke(int error, long description)
      This method will be called when a GLFW error is generated.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        void invoke(int error,
          long description)
        This method will be called when a GLFW error is generated.
        Parameters:
        error - the error code
        description - a pointer to a UTF-8 encoded string describing the error
